categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Pax Chizzik was a male Human Jedi Initiate studying at the Jedi Order's Coruscant Temple academy during the Clone Wars.

A Force-sensitive Human, Pax Chizzik was educated at the Coruscant Jedi Temple to use the Force by the Jedi Order. When the Clone Wars erupted between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Chizzik remained at the Temple where he continued to grow skilled in the ways of the Force and lightsaber combat, wielding a green-bladed training lightsaber.

Strong in the Force and well liked at the Temple's academy, he used his Force powers to increase his likability. In Master Bear's Climbing and Ropework class, orphaned Padawan Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy had assisted him in completing the Twelve Intermediate Knots. Enwandung-Esterhazy summarized him to be a natural leader and having bad footwork. In 19 BBY, Initiate Chizzik participated in the annual Apprentice Tournament overseen by Jedi Master Ilena Xan. During the first round, he was set against Enwandung-Esterhazy. Although he attempted to Force-influence her into throwing the match, she was able to deceive him and eventually hit a pressure point, knocking him to his knees.
